RumorFact.Text: Moon of Cludos, and undergoes extreme tidal forces, resulting in lava on the surface.
The Nomai spotted this moon whilst mining Dhar.
Two Nomai flew on the clan's first interplanetary spaceship to Rico. They found an extremely high abundance of metal, and discussed plans about a spaceport.
On Rico, they turned away from the horizon for 2 seconds. Upon looking back up, a large purple moon was orbiting the planet as well as Rico.
